text: Ri nimalaj awaj ri xawilo are waꞌ ri kꞌo kanoq nabꞌe, man kꞌo ta chi kꞌu chanim, jubꞌiqꞌ karaj kel loq pa ri nimalaj jul ri maj ukꞌisik kꞌa te riꞌ kakꞌam bꞌik rech jeriꞌ kakꞌis tzij puꞌwiꞌ, ri winaq ri man tzꞌibꞌatal ta ri kibꞌiꞌ pa ri wuj rech kꞌaslemal pa ri uwokotajik loq ri uwachulew, kemayijan na are kakil we awaj riꞌ, ri kꞌo kanoq nabꞌe, man kꞌo ta chi kꞌu kamik, katzalij kꞌu na loq.
